cause.description:
Starting in Rhinebeck to everywhere in the US, our goal is to make more survivors out of sudden cardiac arrest victims through donations and fundraisers to get AED's in local buisness' and train more and more people each day in CPR and AED skills. Hero's Arn't Born, Their Trained.
1. A victim of sudden cardiac arrest chance of living decreases 10% every minute that goes by without the use of an AED.
2. An AED is an Automatic External Defibullator which sends a shock to a victims heart when sudden cardiac arrest occurs.
3. The American Heart Association determined that 250,000 people die from cardiac arrest each year!
4. Children and teenagers die almost every day from sudden cardiac arrest, even athletes especially, it's not just something that happens to older adults. Its a real problem that could effect you or someone you know.
cause.mission: Make our communities around the US more heart safe
cause.name: Heart Safe Club
